sentence.Network_en: He is abstemious in eating and drinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在饮食方面是很有节制的.

sentence.Network_en: His father, of all men, had lived a careful life, moderate, abstemious.
sentence.Network_cn: 在所有的人中, 他父亲是一个一生最最小心谨慎 、 处世中和, 食用有节的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... abstain v． 自动戒绝，抑制 abstemious adj． 有节制的，节俭的 abstract n． 摘要.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... abstain v． 自动戒绝，抑制 abstemious adj． 有节制的，节俭的 abstract n． 摘要.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... abstainer 节制者 abstemious 节制的 abstemiously 有节制地.
idle 空闲的，懒惰的abstemious 有节制的，节约的frugal 节俭的.

list.abs: creed of Sun Zhongshan the people's livelihood with " average land ownership " , " abstemious capital " for content , it is a deep social revolution theory .孙中山民生主义以“平均地权”、“节制资本”为内容，是一套深刻的社会革命理论。
personal views on an abstemious society ., 节约型社会之我见.
Secondly is abstemious appetite ., 其次是节制欲望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin abstemius, (from ab- 'from' + a word related to temetum 'alcoholic liquor') + -ous

entry.def: Someone who is abstemious avoids doing too much of something enjoyable such as eating or drinking.

means.word_mean: 1. sparing in consumption of especially food and drink;

sentences.sentence: "the pleasures of the table, never of much consequence to one naturally abstemious"- John Galsworthy

auth_sentence.content: The devout and abstemious Muslim he became.
auth_sentence.res_content: The devout and abstemious Muslim he became.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The devout and abstemious Muslim he became.

auth_sentence.content: The meal of the Saracen was abstemious.
auth_sentence.res_content: The meal of the Saracen was abstemious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The meal of the Saracen was abstemious.

auth_sentence.content: Thanks to abstemious habits, he had not grown fat and flabby.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thanks to abstemious habits, he had not grown fat and flabby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thanks to abstemious habits, he had not grown fat and flabby.

means.word_mean: 适中的,(尤指在吃饭、饮酒方面)有节制的
